code: import{createServer,Model}from"miragejs";import{SportsWearItems}from"../All_Items_iin_app/sportsitems";import ShoesItems from"../All_Items_iin_app/shoesitems";import GymEssentials from"../All_Items_iin_app/gymessentials";import Supplements from"../All_Items_iin_app/supplements";import FoodAndDrinks from"../All_Items_iin_app/foodanddrinks";export var makeServer=function makeServer(){return createServer({models:{sportswear:Model,Shoe:Model,gymessential:Model,supplement:Model,foodanddrink:Model,cartitem:Model},seeds:function seeds(server){SportsWearItems.forEach(function(item){server.create("sportswear",{text:item.text,imgsrc:item.imgsrc,unique:item.unique,markedprice:item.markedprice,discount:item.discount});});ShoesItems.forEach(function(item){server.create("shoe",{text:item.text,imgsrc:item.imgsrc,unique:item.unique,markedprice:item.markedprice,discount:item.discount});});GymEssentials.forEach(function(item){server.create("gymessential",{text:item.text,imgsrc:item.imgsrc,unique:item.unique,markedprice:item.markedprice,discount:item.discount});});Supplements.forEach(function(item){server.create("supplement",{text:item.text,imgsrc:item.imgsrc,unique:item.unique,markedprice:item.markedprice,discount:item.discount});});FoodAndDrinks.forEach(function(item){server.create("foodanddrink",{text:item.text,imgsrc:item.imgsrc,unique:item.unique,markedprice:item.markedprice,discount:item.discount});});},routes:function routes(){this.get("/api/sportswears",function(schema){return schema.sportswears.all();});this.get("/api/cartitems",function(schema){return schema.cartitems.all();});this.post("/api/cartitems",function(schema,request){var attrs=JSON.parse(request.requestBody);console.log("hello",attrs);return schema.cartitems.create(attrs.cartitem);});this.get("/api/shoes",function(schema){return schema.shoes.all();});this.get("/api/gymessentials",function(schema){return schema.gymessentials.all();});this.get("/api/supplements",function(schema){return schema.supplements.all();});this.get("/api/foodanddrinks",function(schema){return schema.foodanddrinks.all();});}});};
